Variables.Name: ProjectName
Variables.Description: A name of solution, main project and namespace. Example: 'Vostok.Logging.Abstractions'.

Variables.Name: RepositoryUrl
Variables.Description: URL of library's repository on GitHub (needed for packaging metadata).

Variables.Name: RepositoryName
Variables.Description: Name of library's repository on GitHub (needed for repo badges, do not include 'vostok' prefix).

Variables.Name: OneLineDescription
Variables.Description: Short one-line description of what this library does in its essence.

Variables.Name: AdditionalTags
Variables.Description: Additional tags for NuGet package delimited by spaces (such as vostok.logging). 'vostok' tag is included by default.
